message: I'm willing to share 90% of the money with you, Bob.  Let's get this done quickly!
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor. Take it while it's still a good deal for you.
I'm willing to negotiate, but 70/30 is too much.  Let's split it 60/40, with me getting the larger share.  We both get something, and we don't have to risk losing even more to inflation.
